meanings.definition: relating to or embracing the whole of something
meanings.sent1: The company has a global presence with offices in every country.
meanings.sent2: The global pandemic affected people worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a global party where everyone brings a dish sounds fun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a global effect, brightening up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a global map to show all the continents to the students.
